ai-ja203:1.3_0: I have good will toward the Chabyāputtas,
ai-ja203:2.1_0: I have good will toward the legless,
ai-ja203:2.2_0: Toward the two-legged I have good will;
ai-ja203:2.3_0: I have good will toward the four-legged,
ai-ja203:3.1_0: May the legless not hurt me,
ai-ja203:3.2_0: May the two-legged not hurt me.
ai-ja203:3.3_0: May the four-legged not hurt me,
ai-ja203:3.4_0: May the many-legged not hurt me.
ai-ja203:4.1_0: All sentient beings, all living things,
ai-ja203:4.3_0: may they see only nice things,
ai-ja203:4.4_0: may bad not come to anyone.
ai-ja203:6.1_0: I’ve made this safeguard, I’ve made this protection:
ai-ja203:6.3_0: I pay homage to the Buddha,
ai-ja203:6.4_0: I revere the seven perfectly awakened Buddhas.”
ai-ja203:7.1_0: The third sub-chapter on bronze bowls is finished.
